bibl.title: Plinyoulk- vs. plinyourg-: Is There Any Difference? <plinthoulk-, plinthourg->
bibl.note: Among the words beginning in plinyoulk- / plinyourg-, the most common in Ptolemaic Egypt were words in plinyoulk-, versus words in plinyourg- occurring especially in Roman and Byzantine Egypt. <plinthoulk-, plinthourg->
WORP K.A., Plinyoulk- vs. plinyourg-: Is There Any Difference? <plinthoulk-, plinthourg->
